Happy Hour

Whoever we are,
Wherever we’ve traveled from,
all melts together at Macadangdang.
The spark of a soft-kissed journey sizzles long through the morning
heat, until it’s time to eat. It’s 1907 in the sugarcane fields.
And you may not know the people around you.
Our hats, all woven from straw.
But dang, what they’re eating looks fine.

One hundred and one years later, that spark of fusion has brought us complex plates, delicately designed in diversity by our Filipino, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Chinese, and Hawaiian ancestors. Our hats may be woven differently, but we’re all hungry – swapping stories and flavors – so our grandparents can live another hundred and one years.

Making a reservation
Book your Macadangdang reservation on Resy
Easy radius map
Email

    We are operating with regular hours today!

    We are open Wednesday-Sunday for happy hour & dinner…

    Happy Hour in the bar area (indoors, no reservations) is from 3-5pm

    & Dinner starts at 5pm (reservations recommended).

    The bar & sushi bar are first-come, first-served (indoors).

    We do accept walk-ins upon availability, but highly recommend reservations if you wish to dine outdoors!

    We are following current Maui County requirements.
    Please only make reservations for indoors if your whole party is able to sit inside.
    Please have your proof of vaccination or negative COVID-19 test within 48 hours available to join us indoors.
